title: Taking the randoms out of normals, looking for 2 more
body:
Looking for 2 more 
Fed up of getting the random crap that comes with normal games 
We play as a 3 most nights 2-3 games and have a drink on fridays and saturdays while playing a few 
We work well together we just need 2 more were fed up of the trolls that come with queing with strangers
We want 2 people to join us were looking for 
An adc and a top laner 
Preferably 18+ so you can have a drink with us 
Rank/skill doesnt matter 
Were a good laugh and we use an app for lol chat which i also post the rotation and patch notes so we are always up to date
A duo or even a couple would be perfect for the team

replies.body:
add meee i can adc, mid or top :D
Kaori Miyazono

IGN: medalarm

I can play every role and every champ, just looking to play with some people.
Id be able to play top but computer getting fixed so probably would have to wait till 10th till i can play
I can do ADC, Can't do the drinking though.
We want to get into ranked but never had a 5 to do it with so will be nornals until were all good with each other

Keen as guys, playing top at the moment working on mastering {{champion:150}} who is just such an amazing counter for most normal picks and even sometimes the abnormal. Im also a great support if needed.
Ign Sadewzz im fairly new i like to jungle but i can top with {{champion:64}}
lad hit me up i am keen only 16 tho but i am pretty funny and get along with practically anyone i can top and adc

I'd be down for that if you're still playing.
IGN: Tempestuous1
Roles in order of aptitude: Jg, Top, Mid, ADC, Supp

Ign - the one you see above this line. 

Support/Jg/Adc
